description: As the name of this restaurant suggests, couscous takes pride of place on the menu, although other Sicilian specialities can also be sampled here. Delightful atmosphere, especially in summer when meals are served in the internal courtyard among the citrus trees.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
